author: Jessica Anderson
title: Senior Engineer, Growth Stage
quote: Got promoted in 4 months using the exact framework. My manager finally had data to fight for me. This works.

author: Robert Taylor
title: Product Manager
quote: Negotiated a 32% raise by following the prep framework. Came with documentation and market research. They couldn't say no.

author: Priya Patel
title: Design Lead
quote: The visibility strategy is game-changing. Went from invisible to the person everyone knows. Career growth followed naturally.

author: Thomas Mueller
title: Principal Engineer
quote: Used the 90-day plan. Hit every milestone. Got promoted and got the raise. Best $99 I've spent.

author: Amanda Brooks
title: Engineering Manager
quote: Recommended this to my team. 3 got promoted, 2 got raises, everyone's more intentional about their career.

author: David Chen
title: Senior Software Engineer
quote: I was stuck for 2 years. Applied the frameworks and mapped out my visible projects. Promoted to staff engineer in 6 months with a 28% raise.

author: Maria Santos
title: Product Manager, Series B
quote: The negotiation scripts are phenomenal. Used them when I switched roles internally. Got $35K more than the initial offer in under 30 minutes.

author: Nathan Brooks
title: Engineering Lead
quote: Followed the promotion framework exactly. Built visibility, expanded scope, proved next-level thinking. Promotion was a done deal by the time I asked for it.

author: Sarah Johnson
title: Senior Data Scientist
quote: Used the negotiation framework for my new job offer. Started at $162K, negotiated to $187K + $25K signing bonus. That's a $50K first-year increase.

author: Eric Lopez
title: Senior QA Engineer
quote: Was invisible in my company. Applied the visibility and scope expansion strategies. Now I'm on every major initiative. Got promoted and hired into a better role.

author: Lisa Wang
title: Product Operations Manager
quote: The frameworks work because they're based on how people actually get promoted, not luck. Used it to get 2 promotions in 18 months and a 54% total salary increase.
